event_title: Tortoises and the Concept of Friendship

interactivity.requirements: Not Thursday 30 Sana Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Self-Medication " from Sana Sakakibara
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit Sana at the School Dorms after all Requirements have been fulfilled.

progression.synopsis: Sana is watching on of her favorite movies, and Sensei joins her. She likes horror movies, and Rin has recently introduced her to shooting people in video games. When she misinterprets some of Sensei's jokes, he says that while Rin has been doing a good job of "coaxing her out of her shell", there's still a ways to go. Sana says that she likes her shell, and that tortoises get along just fine, but says that she'll still keep trying to become more social. Sensei keeps watching movies with Sana until she falls asleep on him.

event_references.event_default_name: Tortoises and the Concept of Friendship

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.9p1.
